name: After Operation Rule for Web Services connector
description: This rule is used by the Web Services connector to update parsed resource object. Create List of Objects which will later converted to Resource object.

input.name: application
input.description: The application whose data file is being processed.

input.name: requestEndPoint
input.description: The current request information contain header, body ,response object

input.name: processedResponseObject
input.description: Response Object processed by the Web services connector

input.name: rawResponseObject
input.description: Response Object returned from the end system

input.name: restClient
input.description: REST Client Object

output.name: Update Account/Group List
output.description: Update information Map contains parsed list of accounts

name: Before Operation Rule for Web Services Connector
description: This rule is used by the  Web Services connector before performing any operation like testconnection, aggregation, etc.

input.name: application
input.description: The application whose data file is being processed.

input.name: requestEndPoint
input.description:
The current request information contain header, body, context url, method type, response attribute map,
          successful response code

input.name: oldResponseMap
input.description: earlier response object

input.name: restClient
input.description: REST Client Object

name: JDBC Provision Rule
description: This JDBC rule can process account creation requests, deletion requests, and modification requests that pertain to the role attribute. It logs debug messages if other account request types are submitted.

input.name: log
input.description: The log object associated with the SailPointContext.

input.name: context
input.description: A sailpoint.api.SailPointContext object that can be used to query the database if necessary.

input.name: application
input.description: The application whose data file is being processed.

input.name: schema
input.description: The Schema currently in use.

input.name: connection
input.description: A connection object to connect to database.

input.name: plan
input.description: The ProvisioningPlan created against the JDBC application.

output.name: result
output.description: A Provisioning Result object is desirable to return the status.IT can be a new object or part of  Provisioning Plan

name: PowerShell Before Creation Rule
description: Executes PowerShell commands on the IQService component before a source account is created.

name: PowerShell Before Modify Rule
description: Executes PowerShell commands on the IQService component before a source account is modified.

name: PowerShell Before Delete Rule
description: Executes PowerShell commands on the IQService component before a source account is deleted.

name: PowerShell After Creation Rule
description: Executes PowerShell commands on the IQService component after a source account is created.

name: PowerShell After Modify Rule
description: Executes PowerShell commands on the IQService component after a source account is modified.

name: PowerShell After Delete Rule
description: Executes PowerShell commands on the IQService component after a source account is deleted.

name: Delimited File BuildMap Rule
description: A BuildMap rule is used to manipulate the raw input data (provided via the rows and columns in the file) and build a map out of the incoming data.

input.name: col
input.description: An ordered list of the column names from the fileâ€™s header record or specified Columns list.

input.name: record
input.description: An ordered list of the values for the current record (parsed based on the specified delimiter)

input.name: application
input.description: The source object sent to the connector from IdentityNow.

input.name: schema
input.description: A reference to the Schema object for the Delimited File source being read.

name: JDBC BuildMap Rule
description: This rule is used by the JDBC connector to build a map representation of the Resultset

input.name: log
input.description: The log object associated with the SailPointContext.

input.name: context
input.description: A sailpoint.api.SailPointContext object that can be used to query the database if necessary.

input.name: application
input.description: The application whose data file is being processed.

input.name: state
input.description: A Map containing state information.

input.name: result
input.description: The ResultSet from database.

input.name: connection
input.description: A connection object to connect to database.

output.name: map
output.description: A Map of the resource object assembled from the data.

name: SAP Build Map Rule
description: Calculates and transforms data from SAP during the aggregation process. Additionally, can perform additional calls back to the SAP system using SAP BAPI calls.

input.name: object
input.description: A reference to a SailPoint attributes object (basically a Map object with some added convenience methods) that holds the attributes that have been built up by the default connector implementation. The rule should modify this object to change, add or remove attributes from the map.

input.name: connector
input.description: A reference to the current SAP Connector

input.name: state
input.description: A Map that can be used to store and share data between executions of this rule during a single aggregation run.

input.name: application
input.description: The application whose data file is being processed.

input.name: schema
input.description: A reference to the Schema object for the Delimited File source being read.

name: SAP HR Provisioning Modify Rule
description: This rule is used to perform SAP HR modification operations during provisioning. This is often used for attribute sync to custom SAP HR attributes.

input.name: application
input.description: The application whose data file is being processed.

input.name: schema
input.description: A reference to the Schema object for the Delimited File source being read.

input.name: destination
input.description: A connected and ready to use SAP destination object that can be used to call BAPI function modules and call to SAP tables.

input.name: plan
input.description: Provisioning plan containing the provisioning request(s)

input.name: request
input.description: AccountRequest being processed; always null for this global rule; only set for SapHrOperationProvisioning

input.name: connector
input.description: A reference to the current SAP Connector
